text: Véronique Besse Véronique Besse (born 11 August 1963 in La Roche-sur-Yon, Vendée) is a member of the National Assembly of France and represents the Vendée department. She is the current mayor of Les Herbiers, after being elected for the first time in 2014 with 57,76% of votes. She has been reelected at her position for a second time in 2020 with 67,18% of votes. Besse is a member of the Movement for France and does not align herself with any parliamentary group. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:People from La Roche-sur-Yon Category:Movement for France politicians Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians
title: Véronique Besse
